title: "Hierarchy, method 2: dendrogram structure"
output: html_notebook

Load packages 

```{r}
#install.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse)
getwd()
```

iMport data
```{r}
compare_methods <- as.data.frame(read_csv("sankey_data_compare_methods.csv"))
```

final data prep (most already done in python)
```{r}
compare_methods$target = compare_methods$target + 20
sequence <- data.frame(node = seq(0, 39, by = 1))
sequence$node_id <- c(paste0("freestyle", seq(1, 20, by = 1)), paste0("dendro", seq(1, 20, by = 1)))
```

now plot
```{r}
sankeyNetwork(Links = compare_methods, Nodes = sequence, Source = "source",
             Target = "target", Value = "value", fontSize = 12, NodeID = "node_id", nodeWidth = 30) %>% 

saveNetwork(file = 'SankeyPlot_compare_hierarchymethods.html')
```
%>%
